snippet: Dispatchers for 911 now ask about recent travels to West Africa, and emergency workers are being trained to use protective gear safely.
abstract: New York City is stepping up its preparedness for Ebola; dispatchers for 911 now ask callers about recent travels to West Africa, and emergency workers are being trained to use protective gear safely.
lead_paragraph: Dispatchers for 911 now ask about recent travels to West Africa, and emergency workers are being trained to use protective gear safely.

headline.main: New York City Steps Up Preparations to Be Ready for Ebola Cases
headline.print_headline: New York City Steps Up Preparations for Ebola
